mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, user_id, user_nick_name, type, ext_name, ext_value, description
mapper.update: update user_ext_info set gmt_modified = now(), user_nick_name = #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_name = #{extName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_value = #{extValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from user_ext_info where user_id=#{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from user_ext_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ext_name=#{extName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
